name: df-perf
body: |- wceq(cperf, crab(s0, ctop, wceq(cfv(cfv(clp, cv(s0)), cuni(cv(s0))), cuni(cv(s0)))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ Perf = { s0 ∈ Top |((limPt ` s0)` ⋃ s0)= ⋃ s0 }
comment: Define the class of all perfect spaces. A perfect space is one for which every point in the set is a limit point of the whole space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Dec-2016.)
